channel.title: Jstestdriver on Oliver Wehrens
channel.description: Recent content in Jstestdriver on Oliver Wehrens

item.title: Javascript testing for Java projects
item.description: I’m a Java Programmer. I do mostly web projects. There is a tendency to move away from server side frameworks towards Javascript (+mvc) and rest services. This now involves me in programming Javascript at the GUI level. Welcome maven, IDE and continous integration. Coming from the JVM world I’m pretty much used to writing tests in my IDE running them and then writing the production code. What I found out, this is not that easy with Javascript.
